original_title: The Adventure of the Ambassador's Disappearance
overview: A gang of crooks are employed to get possession of valuable papers of international importance, held by the French Ambassador, Vicomte de Jarlais. They are also instructed to get the Ambassador out of the way and make it appear that he has committed suicide. His mysterious disappearance arouses the United States Secret Service officers
title: The Adventure of the Ambassador's Disappearance
